docs.snippet: Like many foreign scientists in Britain, Joanna Bagniewska was devastated when Britons voted to leave the European Union. The biology lecturer, a Polish migrant who found Britain a welcoming place to build her academic career over a decade, is sud...
docs.lead_paragraph: Like many foreign scientists in Britain, Joanna Bagniewska was devastated when Britons voted to leave the European Union. The biology lecturer, a Polish migrant who found Britain a welcoming place to build her academic career over a decade, is suddenly seeing her job security and research prospects up in the air.

headline.main: Brexit Uncertainties Threaten Brain Drain for UK Science
headline.print_headline: Brexit Uncertainties Threaten Brain Drain for UK Science

docs.snippet: High up in western Europe's tallest skyscraper, an office layout shows how the power balance in London's property market is shifting in favour of booming tech companies and away from finance firms which may shrink in London after the Brexit vote....
docs.lead_paragraph: High up in western Europe's tallest skyscraper, an office layout shows how the power balance in London's property market is shifting in favour of booming tech companies and away from finance firms which may shrink in London after the Brexit vote.

headline.main: London Offices Have Designs on Tech as Brexit Puts Brake on Finance
headline.print_headline: London Offices Have Designs on Tech as Brexit Puts Brake on Finance

docs.snippet: Britain's decision to leave the European Union is an opportunity to reform the bloc, giving more say to national governments and less to Brussels institutions, Poland's eurosceptic leader Jaroslaw Kaczynski said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's decision to leave the European Union is an opportunity to reform the bloc, giving more say to national governments and less to Brussels institutions, Poland's eurosceptic leader Jaroslaw Kaczynski said.

headline.main: Poland Sees Brexit as Chance to Shift EU Power Back to Nations
headline.print_headline: Poland Sees Brexit as Chance to Shift EU Power Back to Nations

headline.main: UK Government Facing New Brexit Court Case-Sunday Times

headline.main: Consumer Confidence Slips to Lowest Level Since Brexit Vote-YouGov/Cebr
headline.print_headline: Consumer Confidence Slips to Lowest Level Since Brexit Vote-YouGov/Cebr

docs.snippet: When farmers, business leaders and politicians met in north Wales to discuss what Brexit meant for their community, there was barely any mention of immigration - the very issue that dominated the referendum campaign across Britain....
docs.lead_paragraph: When farmers, business leaders and politicians met in north Wales to discuss what Brexit meant for their community, there was barely any mention of immigration - the very issue that dominated the referendum campaign across Britain.

headline.main: Migration Fears Ebb Since Brexit Vote, Giving PM May Breathing Space
headline.print_headline: Migration Fears Ebb Since Brexit Vote, Giving PM May Breathing Space

docs.snippet: The sweetened bid for the rival brewer came in response to the sharp drop in the pound in the weeks since Britain voted to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: The sweetened bid for the rival brewer came in response to the sharp drop in the pound in the weeks since Britain voted to leave the European Union.
docs.abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev sweetens its takeover offer for brewing rival SABMiller; offers 45 pounds, or $59 a share, increase of one pound from previous offer; deal would value SABMiller at 79 billion pounds; offer is among others driven by declining value of British pound following exit from European Union.

headline.main: Post-‘Brexit’ Vote, Anheuser-Busch InBev Raises Offer for SABMiller
headline.print_headline: Pound’s Fall Nudges Anheuser-Busch to Sweeten Offer for SABMiller

docs.snippet: Marine Le Pen, the National Front leader and a presidential candidate, has seized on Britain’s vote to leave the European Union to press the case for a referendum in France....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marine Le Pen, the National Front leader and a presidential candidate, has seized on Britain’s vote to leave the European Union to press the case for a referendum in France.
docs.abstract: France's far-right National Front party and its leader Marine Le Pen have seized on Brexit vote as opportunity to build support for nationalist agenda ahead of 2017 presidential election.

headline.main: France’s Far Right Sees an Opportunity in ‘Brexit’
headline.print_headline: France’s Far Right Seizes Opportunity in Anti-Establishment Anger

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Melissa Eddy and Victor Homola from Berlin, Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome and Benoît Morenne from Paris.

docs.snippet: Jeremy Corbyn, the opposition leader of the British Parliament, said on Friday that Britain had to work on strengthening economic ties with Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeremy Corbyn, the opposition leader of the British Parliament, said on Friday that Britain had to work on strengthening economic ties with Europe.
